focus_lost_warning.description: Warning that appears when exam window focus is lost
focus_lost_warning.message: Warning: You are NOT permitted to switch away from LockDown Browser. Press ESC to return to the exam.

focus_lost_exit.description: Message that appears after the exam window focus is lost and before the an early exit occurs
focus_lost_exit.message: Alert: There was an attempt to switch away from LockDown Browser. The exam will now close.

focus_lost_warning_standard.description: Warning that appears when exam window focus is lost
focus_lost_warning_standard.message: Warning: Do NOT close the browser until the exam is complete. Your instructor will be notified if you exit the exam early. Press ESC to return to the exam.

focus_lost_exit_standard.description: Message that appears after the exam window focus is lost and before the an early exit occurs
focus_lost_exit_standard.message: Alert: There was an attempt to switch away from LockDown Browser. The exam will now close and your instructor will be notified.

close_browser.description: Text for button to close browser

save_close_browser.description: Text for button to save early exit reason and close browser

return_to_exam.description: Text for button to return to exam when prompted to close browser

please_wait.description: Message to display on loading bar to indicate the video is uploading

loading_bar.description: Message to display on loading bar to indicate the video is uploading
loading_bar.message: Do NOT exit LockDown Browser or close your computer until this is complete.

screenshot_warning.description: Warning that appears when a screenshot is detected
screenshot_warning.message: Warning: You are NOT permitted to take screenshots within LockDown Browser. Doing so again will result in the exam closing. Press ESC to return to the exam.

screenshot_exit.description: Message that appears after a screenshot is detected and before the an early exit occurs
screenshot_exit.message: Alert: There was an attempt to take screenshots within LockDown Browser. The exam will now close.

ctrl_alt_shift_warning.description: Message that displays anytime Ctrl + Shift or Alt is pressed
ctrl_alt_shift_warning.message: Warning: Using CTRL + SHIFT or ALT is not permitted during the exam. Press ESC to return to the exam.

dev_tool_exit.description: Message that appears after the user has opened Chrome Developer Tools
dev_tool_exit.message: Warning: There was an attempt to open the Chrome Developer Tools. The exam will now close.

secondary_display_exit.description: Message that appears after the user has connected a secondary display
secondary_display_exit.message: Warning: There was an attempt to add an additional display. The exam will now close.

extension_removed_exit.description: Message that appears after the user has removed Chrome Extension mid-exam
extension_removed_exit.message: The LockDown Browser Chrome Extension was removed.

examearly_providereason.description: Early exit screen - message to provide reason to close
examearly_providereason.message: Provide the reason you are closing the browser before the exam has been completed (required)

continue_to_exit.description: Instructions to press the continue button to exit
continue_to_exit.message: Press the continue button to exit

yes.description: Text for buttons that say yes

no.description: Text for buttons that say no

proctor_password.description: Text for Proctor Password when attempting to early exit

password_enter.description: Text to tell user to enter password

password_error.description: Message when the password is incorrect

popup_system_check.message: Support may direct you to perform a system check or to reload the extension. Those options are available below.

incorrect_password.description: Message that displays when early exit password is incorrect
incorrect_password.message: Incorrect password - select X to retry

exit_confirm.description: Message confirming if user wants to exit
exit_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to exit?

exit_password.description: Message asking user to enter a password to exit
exit_password.message: To exit Respondus LockDown Browser, enter the Exit Password and choose Continue.

exam_link.description: Used as the tab title for external links

close_tabs_header.message: Close extra tabs, windows, and applications

close_tabs_message.message:
LockDown Browser cannot run when other tabs, windows or applications are open. You must close everything except for the exam tab (including this tab).

After closing the following items, try your exam again:

close_tabs_footer.message: Close all tabs and apps, and then proceed to your exam.

extra_displays_message.description: Message to display to user on multipledisplayserror.html
extra_displays_message.message: LockDown Browser cannot run there is more than one display connected. Please remove the extra displays before continuing.

invalid_profile.description: Header to display when no profile is found

invalid_profile_info.description: Message to display when no profile is found
invalid_profile_info.message: There is a problem with the URL for this exam. See this article for more information

extension_not_permitted.description: Header for when the profile indicates the extension is not permitted

extension_not_permitted_info.description: Message when the profile indicates the extension is not permitted
extension_not_permitted_info.message: Your admistrator has not made this exam available to the Chromebook extension. Please contact your administrator or use another version of LockDown Browser to take this exam.

show_fewer.description: Text for link to show less open tabs

close.description: Text for buttons that say close

exam_end.message: Select the Continue button to close LockDown Browser

popup_reportanissue_header.description: Header for report an issue page
popup_reportanissue_header.message: Report a LockDown Browser Issue to Respondus

popup_reportanissue_description.message: Describe your problem with as much detail as possible, including the steps you've taken to resolve it. (We understand you may be frustrated, but please be kind.)

popup_reportanissue_agree.message: I understand and agree that details from this and the prior LockDown Browser sessions will be transmitted to Respondus, Inc. More details

popup_reemail_placeholder.description: Place holder for re-entering Email field

popup_thank_you.description: Thank you text for reporting an issue

popup_thank_message.description: Thank you message for reporting an issue
popup_thank_message.message: Thank you for reporting this issue to Respondus. The information provided will help us improve LockDown Browser. If you provided an email address, you will receive a "Report an Issue" summary email.This information will be extremely helpful to someone troubleshooting an issue.

popup_submission_options.message: We don't generally respond to "Report an issue" submissionsbut there are several options available to you:

popup_submission_option1.message: - If you're on a tight deadline and you cannot resolve the issue, try using LockDown Browser on another computer or device.

popup_submission_option2.message: - Contact your institution's help desk and provide the "Report an Issue" summary that was emailed to you.

popup_submission_option3.message: - Visit the LockDown Browser Knowledge Base where you will find answers to common problems and questions.

popup_submission_option4.message: - Open a support ticket with Respondus. Be sure to include your "Report an issue" summary in the support ticket.

popup_directions.message: To use LockDown Browser, navigate to the test in your learning or assessment system and select the exam. LockDown Browser will launch automatically.

popup_cookies.message: Support may direct you to clear all cookies from this website in order to resolve an issue. That option is available below.

popup_reportissue_link.description: Text for report an issue link

popup_not_chromebook.description: Text that appears when user is not using a Chromebook
popup_not_chromebook.message: To use LockDown Browser, you must be on a Chromebook device.

install_text.description: Text that appears installing LockDown Browser
install_text.message:
The Lockdown Browser for Chromebook extension has been installed.
Locate the test in your learning or assessment system to continue

install_warning_top.description: Warning that appears installing LockDown Browser
install_warning_top.message:
The Lockdown Browser for Chromebook extension has been installed.
Locate the test in your learning or assessment system to continue

install_warning_bottom.description: Text that appears installing LockDown Browser
install_warning_bottom.message: If you are using Mac, Windows or iPad, contact your instructor for download details for the appropriate version of LockDown Browser.

exam_startup_error.description: Error that appears when powering on a device mid-exam
exam_startup_error.message: Your Chromebook was shutdown while LockDown Browser was still running.  The locked state has now been disabled.

link_blocked.description: Error that appears when clicking on a link in secondary tab
